original_body_lines: Managing Director of Abans Group Behman Pestonjee and Yadea Sales Director Southeast Asia Division Alex opened the Yadea electric bike at their flagship showroom in Peliyagoda today. A truck was pulled by the Yadea electric bike to show its strength during the launch. The bike will be sold for less than Rs. 550,000 and save a lot of money on fuel. Pix by Pradeep Pathirana
